reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits perfectly and is very comfortable, with one noting it can be worn with both dressy shoes or boots. Customers disagree on the length of the dress.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A favorite in my wardrobe
items.body: The color is gorgeous, the quality of the dress is very nice. This dress is flattering and comfortable. The fabric is light weight, a little sheer. I wore a half spanx from waist to knee so it was no problem and smooth. This dress is a good value for the money. I am 5’6” 135 lbs and I ordered a M. The fit was a perfect 6. I love the gold velvet leaves on the sheer fabric. Impaired with metallic gold heels, and a gold clutch purse. Dangle earrings and a large gold bangle bracelet. I’ll love wearing this dress again. Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and Very Comfortable
items.body: This dress is GORGEOUS and fit me LIKE A GLOVE. Actually, I couldn't believe how perfectly it fit me (I typically wear a medium which is what I ordered here- and it is definitely true to size). It is just stretchy enough to give that perfectly tailored-to-your-body appearance without being overly constrictive. The length is perfect (it hovers right around the ankles) and the bell sleeves are a really pretty additional touch. I found the dress to be a bit brighter red in person whereas the photos make it appear more burgundy, but it was still very beautiful and I got several compliments. I wore it to my cousin's wedding and was comfortable all night. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Had a fun RIP to her last name bachelorette party and this dress was PERFECT. Fitting and sexy. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10
items.body: This dress is so comfortable. Has a great stretch and fit tts! Perfect for a fall or winter wedding. I do wish it was a smidge longer but love it still. Would purchase again in other colors if needed for an event! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute
items.body: this was cute, i just didn’t keep it cause i wasn’t huge on the sleeves. it’s nice and stretchy and very comfortable and fitting! it just didn’t do it for me Read more
items.author: Meag

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing
items.body: Love the dress and the material. True to size. Lenth was great. I'm 5'1 and it fits perfect Read more
items.author: Rebecca Salinas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend this dress!! Perfect for my baby shower, will be perfect for any event!
items.body: I could not love this dress more!! I wore this for my baby shower. I really only gained weight in my chest/belly, and am normally a Small so I ordered a Medium and it was perfect for this. This fabric is stunning - high quality, stretchy, the bell sleeves are SO pretty! The color isn't quite as magenta perhaps as in the listing photos, a bit more muted but still a very pretty color. It came super wrinkly from being in the packaging and my steamer doesn't work so I sprayed it heavily with water and threw it in the dryer and that worked pretty well to release a lot of the creases/wrinkles. If I had another formal event in the future where I want a dress with sleeves, I would definitely buy this dress in another color and wear this again! Read more
items.author: UAstudentn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Love this dress so comfortable and fit great Read more
items.author: Ann A.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Wine, Brown, Pink, White, Greypink, Darkblue, Rose, Black, Coffee, Redapricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
